title: Cool Guys eSports - Recruiting Mid and Support + 2 subs - Gold or higher
body:
Hello everyone, 

Cool Guy eSports is a brand new esports LoL team looking to compete in tournaments on a monthly basis. The team will be focused on consistent practice and improvement in order to see continuous growth within the team. We are looking for level headed individuals who are looking to grow as players and look into the competitive side of league of legends. Practice will be on Sundays from 6PM-9PM PST. Practices are mandatory in order to play in tournaments. A small set of casual no pressure tryouts will be held this Sunday from 12PM-3PM PST Sunday Nov 4th. 

Application: 

Summoner Name: 
Current Solo/Duo Rank: 
Main Position: 
Main Champions: 
Playstyle: 
Can you shotcall/analyze plays (not required just curious): 

Add me on league SubparZero

Thank you for your time!

Main Position: Jg/Mid 
Main Champions: Jg = Graves, Zac, Kayn, Taliyah, Warwick. Mid = Twisted Fate, Lux, Vel'koz, Yasuo, Zed, Lissandra.
Playstyle: Aggressive and adaptable
Can you shotcall/analyze plays (not required just curious):  Yes, I'm very good at making micro plays and calling shots in the heat of a team fight.

Foldiq
New- unranked
Jg and mid. Currently playing support 
Jax, Kayn, akali, Pyke, rakan 
I can call shots well and have good map awareness.  

I’m a new player to league but I’m getting better quickly. Please train me lol.
